Name: owncloud-client
Overview: Dockerized ownCloud CLI Client (owncloudcmd) to sync from any supported ownCloud-like (e.g. TransIP STACK, NextCloud) enviroment.

@attributes.Name: OC_PASS
@attributes.Description: Password or App-Token for the ownCloud user

@attributes.Name: OC_SERVER
@attributes.Description: ownCloud Server URL, with, if necessary, with port

@attributes.Name: OC_URLPATH
@attributes.Description: Server path to the ownCloud instance

@attributes.Name: OC_FILEPATH
@attributes.Description: Only sync one specific folder. Use '/' for everything

@attributes.Name: RUN_UID
@attributes.Description: UID for the occlient user and sync location

@attributes.Name: RUN_GID
@attributes.Description: GID for the occlient user and sync location

@attributes.Name: OC_WEBDAV
@attributes.Description: In case the webdav path is not default, you can change it here

@attributes.Name: TRUST_SELFSIGN
@attributes.Description: Set to 1 to trust self-signed certificates

@attributes.Name: SYNC_HIDDEN
@attributes.Description: Set to 1 to sync all hidden files within the specified ownCloud directory

@attributes.Name: SILENCE_OUTPUT
@attributes.Description: Set to 0 to get more verbose output

@attributes.Name: RUN_INTERVAL
@attributes.Description: Interval in seconds at which the client will run and check for changes

@attributes.Name: Sync Location
@attributes.Description: The path where the files will be synced to
